issue.title: [C++] Promote Datum variant out of compute namespace
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4022](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4022). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In working on ARROW-3762, I've found it's useful to be able to have functions return either `Array` or `ChunkedArray`. We might consider promoting the `arrow::compute::Datum` variant out of `arrow/compute/kernel.h` so it can be used in other places where it's helpful
